original_text: Then the mother of James and John took them to see Jesus. (Their father was Zebedee.) She went down on her knees in front of Jesus. She asked him to do something good for her.
korean_text: 그 때에 세베대의 아들의 어머니가 그 아들들을 데리고 예수께 와서 절하며 무엇을 구하니

sentences.original_text: Then the mother of James and John took them to see Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 야고보와 요한의 어머니가 그들을 데리고 예수님을 만나러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: She went down on her knees in front of Jesus.
She asked him to do something good for her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그에게 자신을 위해 좋은 일을 해달라고 요청했습니다.
